sentences.en: In addition, obsidian is sacred to the Maoris.
sentences.cn: 此外, 黑曜石是神圣的毛利人之物.

sentences.en: Once you have enough obsidian, activate the idols.
sentences.cn: 一旦你有足够的黑曜石, 激活神像.

sentences.en: Sepulchrals are sacred undead and wield magical obsidian glaives.
sentences.cn: 丧葬者是神圣的亡灵生物,挥舞带有魔力的黑耀石砍刀.

sentences.en: The batch of obsidian foam glass consists of obsidian tailing , cullent power and foaming agent.
sentences.cn: 黑曜岩泡沫玻璃配合料由黑曜岩废料、玻璃粉和发泡剂组成.

sentences.en: The Texas show includes an obsidian mask that likely traveled to Khara Khorum all the way from Egypt, Lessem says.
sentences.cn: 德克萨斯州展出包括了一个黑曜石面具，可能是从埃及被带到哈喇和林来的，莱塞姆说。

sentences.en: Upgrade Aura of Blight - Increases the regenerative effect of the Obsidian Statue's hit point regeneration.
sentences.cn: 升级枯萎光环 - 增加黑曜石雕像的生命恢复的效果.

sentences.en: Volcanic rock includes the volcanic glass obsidian.
sentences.cn: 火山岩包括黑曜岩火山玻璃.

trans.tran_en: a type of rock that looks like black glass
